page.title: 04Highbrook - Employment
page.content: There is little employment in the area other than a few jobs in service industries and agriculture, dairy and arable farming. The only light industry is a sawmill. There is some employment in horticulture, an orchard and a nursery. The majority of jobs are in service industries, the Bluebell railway (a preserved steam railway catering for tourists), a small Roman Catholic language and finishing school and a retirement home. Domestic service provides jobs for cleaners and gardeners in the several large houses; the owners work outside the area, often commuting to London.
